name: PricewaterhouseCoopers
description: PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP (Pwc) provides professional services. The Company offers business advisory services such as auditing, accounting, taxation, strategy management, and human resource consulting services.

name: Kolesa group
description: Kolesa LLP is an Almaty based company, a leader in Kazakhstani classifieds business. We run kolesa.kz, the №1 automotive classified project, and krisha.kz, the №1 realty estate classified project in Kazakhstan. “Kolesa” can be translated to English as car wheels. “Krisha” in Russian means a house roof.
